# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/enzyme`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Enzyme (https://github.com/airbnb/enzyme).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/types-2.0/enzyme

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Mon, 28 Nov 2016 16:28:39 GMT
 * File structure: ProperModule
 * Library Dependencies: none
 * Module Dependencies: react
 * Global values: none
